package.name: amcl6d_tools
package.description:
This package provides tools needed for the amcl6d library.
It adds the messages which are also used by the Las Vegas Reconstruction Toolkit to assure compatibility and also the possibility to run the raytracer and other things as standalone packages.
However, it needs the I/O tools of meshing.pg2013 to run the meshpublisher.
package.author: Sebastian Höffner
Thomas Wiemann
Denis Meyer
